title: Review of Trading Engine Risk Protocols and AgentGladiator Stability

reasoning.problem: Initiate a review of the Trading Engine's risk management protocols, focusing on the efficacy of the 'Fear of Loss Inhibition' axiom in light of the current cash reserve depletion. Specifically, assess whether the accelerated response to potential losses is inadvertently contributing to excessive trading and subsequent capital erosion. Also, a secondary assessment of AgentGladiator instability is required, the rapid restarts are unsustainable and affecting overall system performance.
